alert.note: Alert for Susitna Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 5:13AM AKST until February 16 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches. * WHERE...Susitna Valley. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 6 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will develop by early Wednesday morning and spread quickly from south to north. The snow may be heavy at times, especially during the morning commute. The highest snow totals are expected along the Parks Highway from Talkeetna south.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
